message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $12,000. I believe it offers significant value, even at this price point. What are your thoughts?
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
Hi Bob, I understand your desire to save, but $12,000 is already a competitive price.  Could you meet me halfway at $10,500?
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still looking to save more. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
